name: wonder-guard

effect.sun_moon: fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.

short_effect: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
